# image

**Instance Property**

The image displayed in the Siri watch face card.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var image: INImage? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The image should be a square image. [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INDefaultCardTemplate] automatically scales the image to fit and rounds the image corners, and the card template supports image transparency.

## Managing Template Information

- **title**: The title displayed in the Siri watch face card.
- **subtitle**: The subtitle displayed in the Siri watch face card.
